video_prompt: A dynamic female dancer intensely moves on a brightly lit stage. Her voluminous golden-auburn hair whips and cascades around her as she leans forward, mid-jump or step, turning her body with an exhilarated upward gaze. Her gesturing arms sweep through the air, while her red track pants show fluid creases. Her foot actively pushes off the glowing stage floor, casting elongated shadows. Intense stage lights radiate and subtly shift, illuminating her powerful, confident performance to a blurred, murmuring audience.
image_prompt:
Here are a few options, from more detailed to very concise:

**Option 1 (Detailed & Comprehensive):**
"Vibrant digital painting, highly painterly with expressive brushstrokes. Energetic female dancer in a dynamic pose, mid-jump, leaning forward, head tilted upwards, arms open. Her incredibly voluminous, long, wavy golden-auburn hair cascades dramatically, glowing with brilliant highlights. She wears a red crop top with white stripes, red track pants with white vertical stripes, and white athletic sneakers. Set on a brightly lit, textured, reflective stage floor glowing with white, lavender, blue, and pink. Strong directional stage lighting from above casts dramatic highlights, against a dark blue-black background featuring blurred white/yellow and blue circular stage lights and a muted, abstract audience. Vibrant reds, golden yellows, stark whites, deep blues create an exhilarating and passionate atmosphere."

**Option 2 (Concise & Keyword-focused):**
"Vibrant painterly digital art, expressive brushstrokes. Energetic female dancer, dynamic mid-jump pose, head up, arms open. Voluminous, glowing golden-auburn hair. Red striped crop top, red striped track pants, white sneakers. Brightly lit, reflective stage floor (white, lavender, blue, pink). Strong directional stage lighting, dramatic highlights. Dark blue-black background with blurred stage lights (white, yellow, blue) and abstract audience. Vibrant reds, golden yellows, whites, deep blues. Exhilarating, passionate performance."

**Option 3 (Very Concise):**
"Painterly digital art: energetic female dancer mid-jump, voluminous glowing golden-auburn hair, red striped outfit. Brightly lit reflective stage, strong directional lighting, blurred dark background with stage lights and audience. Vibrant, high-contrast, dynamic."
refined_video_prompt: A dynamic female dancer intensely moves. Her golden-auburn hair whips and cascades as she leans and turns, mid-action, with an exhilarated upward gaze. Gesturing arms sweep through the air, and her track pants' creases fluidly shift. Her foot actively pushes off, creating moving shadows. Stage lights subtly shift and radiate, dynamically illuminating her powerful, confident performance to a subtly shifting, murmuring audience.
